programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
programme.desc: When Sophie and new girlfriend Bee attend a party at a remote family mansion, drugs and alcohol flow. Bee unknowingly devours a dope-spiked cake, and tension between revellers explodes in the darkened house during a game of Bodies Bodies Bodies. However, one member of the party soon plays a victim for real. Horror comedy, starring Amandla Stenberg, Maria Bakalova and Rachel Sennott Halina Reijn - Director Amandla Stenberg - Sophie Maria Bakalova - Bee Rachel Sennott - Alice Chase Sui Wonders - Emma Pete Davidson - David Myha'la Herrold - Jordan Lee Pace - Greg.

programme.title: Sharp Stick
programme.desc: A naive 26-year-old living on the fringes of Hollywood with her mother and sister longs to be seen. When she begins an affair with her older employer, she is given a crash course in sexuality, loss and power. programme.title: The Prince and Me
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Julia Stiles as a hard-working undergraduate at the University of Wisconsin. programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: King Ghezo succeeds his brother on the throne of the West African kingdom of Dahomey, in direct opposition to the Oyo Empire. However, the evening takes a turn when he unveils his elaborate plan seeking revenge for their betrayals, and to play, they will have to give up the one thing they've spent their lives trying to keep - their secrets. As the game unfolds, thieves break in and they must band together to survive a night of terror. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. Revealed as a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as 'Beekeepers', he sets out on a brutal quest of vengeance, hunting those responsible for the incident, who have seriously underestimated how much of a threat he is. Action thriller, starring Jason Statham, Jeremy Irons, Minnie Driver and Jemma Redgrave David Ayer - Director Jason Statham - Adam Clay Emmy Raver-Lampman - Agent Verona Parker Josh Hutcherson - Derek Danforth Bobby Naderi - Agent Matt Wiley Minnie Driver - Director Janet Harward Phylicia Rashad - Eloise Parker Jeremy Irons - Wallace Westwyld Enzo Cilenti - Rico Anzalone.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Asteroid City
programme.desc: Playwright Conrad Earp has penned a play about a convention of young astronomers in the summer of 1955. The lines soon blur between a programme dedicated to the writer and the play itself. programme.title: Breaking
programme.desc: A Marine war veteran faces mental and emotional challenges when he tries to reintegrate into civilian life. programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and fellow Impossible Missions Force operatives Benji Dunn and Luther Stickell race to acquire two halves of an interlocking 3D key that can regain control of a lethal artificial intelligence. programme.title: L'immensità
programme.desc: In 1970s Rome, a mother contends with her loveless and abusive marriage while caring for her children, one of who is experiencing gender dysphoria and wishes to identify as a boy. programme.title: Mavka: The Forest Song
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Children's, Animation, Comedy, Family ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: Kind-hearted village artist Lucas travels deep into the enchanted forest to locate a tree that bears a special insignia. In this realm of magic and wonder, Lucas locks eyes with inquisitive nymph Mavka, who yearns to rebuild bridges between the human and spirit worlds. Animated fantasy adventure, with the voices of Natalka Denisenko, Artem Pyvovarov and Olena Kravets Oleh Malamuzh - Director Oleksandra Ruban - Director Yevheniy Yermak - Director Laurie Hymes - Mavka Eddy Lee - Lucas Sarah Natochenny - Kylina Mike Pollock - The One Who Sits on the Rock Marc Thompson - Lesh / Hush.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. Animated adventure with the voices of Stephen Fry and Hugh Laurie Kim Burdon - Director Robert Chandler - Co director Stephen Fry - Sir Simon de Canterville Emily Carey - Virginia Otis Freddie Highmore - Henry, Duke of Cheshire Hugh Laurie - Grim Reaper Gardener / Swordsman / Mephisto Monster / Old Duke Imelda Staunton - Mrs Umney Meera Syal - Lucretia Otis David Harewood - Hiram Otis Miranda Hart - Algernean Van Finchley Toby Jones - The Reverend Chasuble aka The Vicar.
